projects.title: ShortLink
projects.content: Web application designed to simplify and customize long URLs, turning them into short, easy-to-share links. This platform also includes user authentication and link management

projects.title: ms-ui-toast
projects.content: A minimalist React library. Fast, accessible, and easy to integrate into any modern project

projects.title: Hackthon Cloudinary
projects.content: Halloween-themed project focused on adding or removing elements from user images. I demonstrated creativity and problem-solving skills

projects.title: mls-shop
projects.content: Final project for Fernando Herrera's Nexjs course on an e-commerce site based on Tesla Shop with PayPal integration

projects.title: Challenge FACTUS
projects.content: Challenge by a Colombian company, which consisted of creating a platform that allows the generation of invoices using their API

projects.title: Ecommerce Admin
projects.content: It facilitates the management of online stores, allowing you to manage products, categories and orders efficiently. It offers a control panel optimized for productivity

projects.title: Ecommerce Store
projects.content: Offers a complete online shopping experience, with Stripe integration for secure payments. Built with the above Admin eCommerce API

projects.title: API MVC
projects.content: Backend solution that follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture pattern. It allows CRUD operations to be performed on a movie database, deployed on Railway
